name: rhmrcl1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c1, crg))

stmt.origin: elmpt2cl1(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crh, c2, crg, crg, cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))))
stmt.pretty: elmpt2cl1(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, crh, c2, crg, crg, ((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)⋂((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c1, crg))
-| wceq(crh, cmpo(hs0, hs1, crg, crg, cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, crg)
-| diffsc(hs0, crg)
-| diffsc(hs1, crg)
-| diffsc(hs1, crg)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RingHom]c2)→ c1 ∈ Ring)
⊣ RingHom =(hs0 ∈ Ring, hs1 ∈ Ring ↦((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)⋂((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1))))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, Ring)
⊣ d(hs0, Ring)
⊣ d(hs1, Ring)
⊣ d(hs1, Ring)
